name: Dark Silence
description:
Dark Silence was developed as a study of old school top-down space shooters seen on many arcades back in the day.

-Controls-

WASD - Move left, right, up and down.

SPACEBAR - Hold down to shoot.

Q - Dash in the direction you are moving in.

-Credits-

Lead Programmer, Game Designer: Claudio Micieli

Artist, Sound Designer, Programmer: Jacob Roman
